nodes.text: The A4 Juggernaut was a centuries-old war vehicle used by the Galactic Republic.
By the time of the Galactic Empire's rise, this tracked vehicle was no longer considered top-of-the-line military equipment and had long since been replaced by the A5 and A6 models.

The brilliant weapons/droid engineer Min Erethen used a modified A4 named the Sanctum Sanctorum as a base-of-operations aboard the guardian corvette Bhishana Bhaga while working for Arakyd Industries.
